TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted but he changes the mod to one about crashing your game

I wish for a pet penguin

FYI I own a Mac

Granted. It murders you and takes over the world.

I wish for the .22 update!

Wish granted, it causes KSP to CTD 0.22 seconds after launch until 0.22.1, but then the company tanks.

I wish Unity would make a 64-bit version.

Granted but it cost $100,000,000

I wish for a broken computer
Granted, but it turns to dust, which promptly comes to life and infects another PC nearby, thus starting the PC eating dust-virus. EDIT: I wish for someone to post in the thread right below this.

Granted, but you start a paradox-(The universe rips apart, then implodes)

I wish for MOAR POWAR
Granted, you gain so much energy, the world's electricity grid goes down. You are then hooked up to massive transformers, and become Earth's future clean energy source. For eternity.

You made no extra wish, Mysterious_MrQ. Anyways,

I wish for ultra-light fuel that can take me to Jool with one fuel tank.

You get to Jool, your 1 tank empties, and you get sucked in because you did not circularize and get destroyed by the pressure.

I wish for an anomaly finding super-vehicle.

Granted, but you find an anomaly, get sucked into it and come out the other side as Jebs play thing.

I wish for someone to make a rectangular bay you can build a ship around for rover recovery.

Granted, however I know that you are lying, so I have corrupted it by posting.

I wish for something bad to happen to me.

Not granted, because having your wish not granted is a bad enough thing to happen.

I wish people would stop wishing

That could be arranged, but the forum would soon boil over because people would have nowhere to deposit their wishes.

I wish I had more wine.

Granted. You're now very drunk.

I wish for a life.

Granted it comes from a toddler complaining about not getting a toy at walmart.

I wish I were an Oscar Meyer Weenier.

Granted, but you are soon grilled and eaten.

I wish I had a nice new hockey stick.

Granted, but you are unable to use it due to its extreme weight. ("Mass!" says Gene Kerman)

I wish to stop procrastinating and get an imgur account already.
I wish i had a girlfriend Gets a total bitch!

Granted, but because you didn't grant the above person's wish, you are brutally murdered instead.

I wish people would stop being jerks.

Granted, but now youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re the only jerk left in the world and everybody hates you.

i wish i wasn't so funny....

Granted, but you tire of boredom (department of redundancy department) and become funny again.

I wish for wit.

Granted but, your wit is so dry, you become the old weird dude down the street.

I wish I would stop playing KSP so much and get some sleep for once.
Granted, but you ever go on the forum, so you never wished, so nothing happens. Then Jeb crashes a rocket into your house.

Not granted, because you didn't have a wish

I wish the N1 worked

Granted. The Soviets got to the Moon before the USA did, thus leading all nations to adopt Stalin-type communism.

I wish people would stop fawning over famous people and athletes, and start fawning over scientists, mathematicians, aerospace engineers, and the space program.
